name: colorful wedges baby blanket
notes:
materials
7 skeins of purl sohoâ€™s [mulberry merino][1], 80% extra fine merino wool, and 20% mulberry silk; or 7 skeins containing approximately 247 yards each of a [sport weight][2] yarn

- colors a, c, d, e, f: 1 skein (approximately 101 yards) per color
- color b: 2 skeins (approximately 505 yards) required.

you will also need:

- us 5 (3.75 mm), 24-inch [circular needles][3]

gauge
20 stitches and 40 rows = 4 inches in garter stitch 

size
finished dimensions: approximately 30 inches wide x 30 inches long


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/mulberry-merino.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/yarn/knitting-crochet.html?yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools/knitting-needles.html?type_filter=881
